subject: Re: Your Loan Approval  (2007.July 'The Lowest': 30 Y.Fixed - 4.59 %)
body:
Thank you for your loan request (Case#: FT85 - 787926051845), which we recieved yesterday, your refinance application has been accepted!

Good Credit or Not, We are ready to give you a $446,000 loan, after further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments.

Approval process will take only 1 minute.

Please visit the confirmation link below and fill-out our short 30 second Secure Web-Form. 

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=mortgage+refinancing+easyratemortage&btnI=IyvsE2rgoF229bP


Demetrius Carson
Loan Central
